thread.title: Spurs-Suns live chat with Tom Orsborn
thread.title_full: Spurs-Suns live chat with Tom Orsborn - San Antonio Express-News

author: Tom Orsborn
title: Spurs-Suns live chat with Tom Orsborn
text:
Photo: Tom Reel, San Antonio Express-News Image 1 of / 4 4 Tony Parker tries to work around Eric Bledsoe in the first half as the Spurs play the Phoenix Suns at the At&T Center on January 9, 2015. Tony Parker tries to work around Eric Bledsoe in the first half as the Spurs play the Phoenix Suns at the At&T Center on January 9, 2015. Photo: Tom Reel, San Antonio Express-News Image 2 of 4 Spurs’ Kyle Anderson passes around the Phoenix Suns during the first half of an NBA summer league basketball game Monday, July 20, 2015, in Las Vegas. Spurs’ Kyle Anderson passes around the Phoenix Suns during the first half of an NBA summer league basketball game Monday, July 20, 2015, in Las Vegas. Photo: John Locher /Associated Press Image 3 of 4 Phoenix Suns' Marcus Morris pulls down a rebound against San Antonio Spurs' Matt Bonner, right, during the first half of an NBA basketball game, Wednesday, Dec. 18, 2013, in Phoenix. (AP Photo/Matt York) Phoenix Suns' Marcus Morris pulls down a rebound against San Antonio Spurs' Matt Bonner, right, during the first half of an NBA basketball game, Wednesday, Dec. 18, 2013, in Phoenix. (AP Photo/Matt York) Photo: Matt York, STF / Associated Press Image 4 of 4 Spurs’ Reggie Williams looks for room around Phoenix Suns’ Archie Goodwin during second half action Sunday April 12, 2015 at the AT&T Center. The Spurs won 107-91. Spurs’ Reggie Williams looks for room around Phoenix Suns’ Archie Goodwin during second half action Sunday April 12, 2015 at the AT&T Center. The Spurs won 107-91. Photo: Edward A. Ornelas /San Antonio Express-News Spurs-Suns live chat with Tom Orsborn 1 / 4 Back to Gallery Join Express-News Spurs beat writer Tom Orsborn Tuesday at noon as the five-time NBA champions prepare to take on the Phoenix Suns in their penultimate preseason game.
Starting at 6 a.m. Tuesday, you can leave questions for Tom by commenting below, or by tweeting directly at him, @tom_orsborn.
The Q&A will stay posted even after the chat concludes, so you can read back through all of Tom's interactions and answers leading up to the tip.
RELATED: Point Game Podcast: Talking Spurs, NBA with Steve Smith
Throughout the season, one of the Express-News' handful of Spurs beat reporters – Jeff McDonald, Dan McCarney, Mike Monroe, Tom Orsborn and Jabari Young — will be on hand to answer any and all Spurs-related questions you may have.
Along with the chats, follow our reporters on Twitter, read them daily in the Express-News and at MySA.com and Express-News.com and subscribe to the new weekly Spurs Nation magazine.
torsborn@express-news.net
Twitter: @tom_orsborn
